code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant browser
    participant server


    browser->>server: GET 	https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/spa
    activate server
    server-->>browser: HTML document
    deactivate server


    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/main.css
    activate server
    server-->>browser: the css file
    deactivate server

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/spa.js

    activate server
    server-->>browser: the JavaScript file
    deactivate server


    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/data.json
    activate server
    server-->>browser: [Education_StudentDB}, ... ]
    deactivate server

    browser->>server: POST https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/new_note_spa

    activate server
    server-->>browser: [Education_ClassroomService}, ... ]
    deactivate server

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 首先，我们需要定义流程的起点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 整体架构包含GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/spa.js、GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/data.json这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/spa.js、GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/data.json应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/spa.js、GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/data.json的作用是...
